subject: A-M-S-I-E2014:Advanced Management Science and Information Engineering<WIT><EI/ISTP>
body:
AMSIE2014
December 25-26, 2014, Hong Kong
<http://www.amsie2014.org/index.htm>
2014 International Conference on Advanced Management Science and Information Engineering (AMSIE2014) which purpose is holds the advance and improvement of Advanced Management Science and Information Engineering.
All accepted papers will be published by WIT Transactions on Information and Communication Technologies (ISSN: 1743- 3517) <http://library.witpress.com/pages/listBooks.asp?tID=3> which will be indexed by EI and ISTP. Excellent papers will be selected and published on SCI and EI journals.
Topics (Other related topics)
Management Engineering
Management theory
Strategic management
Management information system
Enterprise information system and electronic government
Information Engineering
Antennas & Propagation
Information indexing & retrieval
Cloud computing
Intelligent Robotics
Hybrid information technology
Vehicular communications
The topics are wide, ranging from machine learning algorithms to models of real nervous systems.
Paper Submission
Download the Paper Format: <http://www.amsie2014.org/Paper_Format.rar>
Download the Submission Form:
<http://www.amsie2014.org/AMSIE2014_Submission_Form.xlsx>
All papers should be write in English . And the email subject should be named "Submission".
Important Dates
Paper Submission due: Before October 22
Authors' Registration: Before October 31
Contact us
Email: amsie2014@163.com <mailto:amsie2014@163.com>
Tel:+86-15926486152
